name: QLRZ (colorz)
description:
A love letter to the masters of the puzzle-action genre (think game boy's tetris, game gear's columns, nes dr mario, ikaruga and such masterpieces).
QLRZ (colorz) is an intense arcade color mixing game aiming for a tetris-like flow, endowed with beautiful art and music, and a unique gameplay that will cleanly blow your socks off.
FEATURES :
Super addictive game flow
Deep scoring system
Enormous bosses
Superb hand painted art
Amazeballs soundtrack
Online Leaderboards
English, Spanish and French languages
